review_data.title: "Bilgeristube" is a really nice venue
review_data.content: Had some business dinners there, in Feb. 2012 for the second time. The Bilgeristube was a really nice venue, a real old Swiss restaurant hall. The food was decent and the service very friendly. Overall a very pleasant experience!
